Besides enormous knowledge and great approach, Anna is simply a wonderful person, with whom every visit is truly a pleasure - which additionally motivates to work on your body. She asks, checks how you feel during, wants to learn more about you to better help you, listens. The problem disappeared after the first visit and exercises, which seemed impossible. The next visit also immediately brought results. I really could write another thousand words and they would all be superlatives - I greatly appreciate and will certainly visit regularly.
